task.title: Test Campaign Execution- Add Test Case Results

context.p: It is important to record the results of executed test cases.
This can be done via test campaign execution.
One can use the filter options to find the test campaign for which you wish to record results.

ul.li: Select "Select a test Campaign" from Quick Links

step.cmd: Enter Test Campaign Execution by using the Play button

info.p: Use the Add Result button to add the test case results. Fill in the following fields:

sl.sli: Comment: Any relevant comments you wish to include
Execution Time: The time it took to execute the test case
Improvement Story: If the case execution drives an improvement specify the improvement jira here
Defect Id: One or many jira bugs if the test case has failed
Create Bug: Allows users to create jira bug based on test case execution results directly from TMS

step.info: Make sure to save your results using the Save button!

result.p: Test case results have now been updated.
